channel.title: I need a basic rundown of how to obtain a Private Server
channel.description:
Ok, I know what a Private Server does and I would like to obtain one, the problem is, I dont know where to start!
I would really appreciate it if someone could give me a breif rundown of how to get one.
And last, I'm new to these boards so Hi ;D

item.title: I need a basic rundown of how to obtain a Private Server
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Did you search for more server IPs?

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Or try your own server?

http://www.play.ezpeer.net/FileDump.html (server.zip)

Read full topic
item.source: I need a basic rundown of how to obtain a Private Server

item.title: I need a basic rundown of how to obtain a Private Server
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Coolnoob55:

Actually you left out a WHOLE lot of things you would also need Java JDK 5.0 inorder to run it I’m pretty sure correct me if I’m wrong and also set environmental variables too…

To compile ;).

item.title: I need a basic rundown of how to obtain a Private Server
item.dc:creator: @reaperofdb reaperofdb
item.description:
@reaperofdb wrote:

Okay, first you would get one. I would say you should get the Cheezscape source. Once I find the link to it I will post it here. Then unzip it or whatever. Inside the folder where unzipped it, create a new folder called moreinfo. Then doubleclick on run.bat or runserver.bat. Voila you now have a server running.

Read full topic
